definition[0]: a fully-grown person, or one who is considered to be legally responsible for their actions
example[0]: Some children find it difficult to talk to adults.
example[1]: The adults have white bodies and grey backs.
example[4]: He lived most of his adult life in Scotland.
definition[3]: typical of an adult’s behaviour or of the things adults do
example[5]: dealing with problems in an adult way
example[6]: That wasn’t very adult of you.
definition[4]: adult films, magazines etc are about sex or related to sex
example[7]: The film is rated R for language and adult themes.
